name: src/client.js
Client
description:
Client class, used as controller for players.
Also initializes the socket communication.

params.name: proxy
params.description: Optional cors proxy url for the browser

name: initialize
description: Checks session and initializes communication, must be called first!

name: createSocket
description: Initializes CometD client

name: checkSession
description: Checks existance of pin

name: doLogin
description:
Adds main player to the game, this is normally called after initialize to get other functions working.
Automatically bruteforces 2FA

name: addPlayer
description: Adds a player to the game

params.name: cid
params.description: The unique id of the player, helper function randomCid can be used for this

name: src/events.js
content:
export default {
  getReady: 1,
  startQuestion: 2,
  gameOver: 3,
  timeUp: 4,
  playAgain: 5,
  answerSelected: 6,
  answerResponse: 7,
  revealAnswer: 8,
  startQuiz: 9,
  resetController: 10,
  submitFeedback: 11,
  feedback: 12,
  revealRanking: 13,
  userNameAccepted: 14,
  userNameRejected: 15,
  requestRecoveryDataFromPlayer: 16,
  sendRecoveryDataToController: 17,
  joinTeamMembers: 18,
  joinTeamMembersResponse: 19,
  startTeamTalk: 20,
  skipTeamTalk: 21,
  iframeControllerEvent: 31,
  serverIframeMessage: 32,
  storyBlockGetReady: 40,
  reactionSelected: 41,
  reactionResponse: 42,
  gameBlockStart: 43,
  gameBlockEnd: 44,
  gameBlockAnswer: 45,
  submitTwoFactorAuth: 50,
  twoFactorAuthIncorrect: 51,
  twoFactorAuthCorrect: 52,
  resetTwoFactorAuth: 53
}

name: src/helpers.js
Helpers
description: Helper class, contains static functions used when authenticating

name: getTime
description: Gets unix time

name: shiftBits
description: Does some magic by xor'ing the session and challenge to generate a url

name: convertDataToBinary
description: Converts any data to binary data

name: solveChallenge
description: Solves challenge to get the first part of authentication out of the way

name: randomCid
description: Generates random id for players

name: src/index.js
src/information.js
Information
description: Information class, used for communication with the Kahoot quiz gateway

name: authenticate
description: Authenticates to kahoot, must be called first

name: search
description: Searches kahoots for the specified term

name: getGame
description: Searches kahoots for the specified term

name: src/player.js
Player
description:
Player class, created when calling addPlayer. 
Contains player related functions

name: sendPacket
description: Sends a packet to Kahoot

params.name: data
params.description: Data to send to channel specified

name: twoFactorLogin
description: Attempts 2FA login using code, 0000 to 3333

name: bruteForceTwoFactor
description: Attempts all 2FA codes until logged in

name: removeFromGame
description: Remove this player from the game

name: sendTeam
description: Send team name array, only works when the game is a team game

params.name: names
params.description: The names of teammates you want to add

name: sendGameAnswer
description: Sends a game answer for the current question

name: disconnect
description: Disconnect from the game

content:
# Kahoot API

An API for the kahoot.it quiz platform. Includes all the features of [kahoot-tools](https://github.com/idiidk/kahoot-tools)

## Installation

Install with npm or yarn

```bash
yarn add kahoot-api
# or
npm install kahoot-api
```

## Usage

For usage please refer to the [documentation](https://idiidk.site/kahoot-api)

## Contributing
Pull requests are welcome. For major changes, please open an issue first to discuss what you would like to change.

Please make sure to update tests as appropriate.

## License
[MIT](https://choosealicense.com/licenses/mit/)
name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "kahoot-api",
  "version": "0.2.1",
  "description": "An API for the Kahoot quiz service.",
  "main": "index.js",
  "scripts": {
    "build": "babel src -d lib",
    "prepublish": "npm run docs && babel src -d lib",
    "test": "npm run build && mocha",
    "docs": "esdoc -c esdoc.json",
    "bundle": "parcel build --global Kahoot src/index.js"
  },
  "repository": "https://github.com/idiidk/kahoot-api",
  "author": "idiidk",
  "license": "MIT",
  "private": false,
  "dependencies": {
    "atob": "^2.1.2",
    "axios": "^0.18.0",
    "cometd": "^4.0.3",
    "cometd-nodejs-client": "^1.0.2",
    "tiny-emitter": "^2.1.0"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@babel/cli": "^7.2.3",
    "@babel/core": "^7.3.4",
    "@babel/preset-env": "^7.3.4",
    "esdoc": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "mocha": "^6.0.2",
    "parcel-bundler": "^1.12.0"
  }
}
name: package.json
